name: Scurvy and More
description:
My show reel shows what all i accomplished in 3 years time at University. I got to work on 2 group projects with almost 20 people and we spent 6-7 weeks developing a proper game and multiple solo projects on Unreal engine and Unity.

My most recent project was a group project part of our university course in which we developed a Kart racing game in 6 weeks in remote working due to the lockdown situations. I worked as a programmer and am very proud of what me and the other 19 students achieved

Here is a link to my portfolio it has more details on what i have done :

https://jehanzebali8.wixsite.com/mysite

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Scurvy is a third person rag doll physics game that has  a Last man standing game mode.

The goal is simple , attack your opponents by punching them or avoid them to be the last man standing.The Map has objects with random gravity and 'wacky' physics.

The main goal for this game was to figure out how to work with the Unreal engine physics and how to create things such as Dynamic cameras and a player selection etc that changes the Ui automatically.

This game although simple features a dynamic camera that changes its height and location according to all locations of the players. Along with that if features a main game loop that changes all aspects according to how many players are playing etc.

I am currently still working on improving the game by adding new character meshes , maps and much more 

All feedback is appreciated
